theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on let-7 microRNA regulating stem cell aging and niche signaling, fitting the stem cell aging regulatory theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes let-7b/Hmga2/Ink4a/Arf pathway governing neural stem cell aging, clearly within stem cell aging miRNA regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on miRNAs regulating hematopoietic stem cell aging and longevity, fitting stem cell aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: General theory on miRNA regulation of multiple adult stem cell types aging, directly related to stem cell aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses miRNA regulation of adult stem cell properties, senescence, and mitochondrial function, fitting stem cell aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-9/CBX7 feedback loop regulates p16INK4a and senescence, a key mechanism in stem cell aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Phasic control of let-7 and miR-125 regulating neuronal integrity and lifespan, related to stem cell/neural aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Aging MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-125-chinmo axis mediates dietary restriction-dependent lifespan extension via neuronal and fat metabolism regulation, linked to stem cell/neural aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Vascular and Immune Cell MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-34a promotes vascular cell senescence and inflammaging, focusing on vascular aging and immune inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Vascular and Immune Cell MicroRNA Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-146a and miR-155 regulate T cell metabolic reprogramming and inflammaging, fitting immune cell aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Circulating MicroRNA Systemic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on circulating miRNAs as systemic regulators of aging and their modulation by calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Circulating MicroRNA Systemic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes circulating small noncoding RNAs including miRNAs as systemic aging biomarkers and regulators.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Circulating MicroRNA Systemic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Exosomal circulating miRNAs regulate systemic aging signaling pathways, fitting circulating miRNA systemic regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-related decline in Dicer-mediated miRNA processing affecting stress resistance and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: General theory on miRNAs as regulators of cellular deterioration and aging, including their biogenesis and functional decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes miRNAs modulating conserved aging signaling pathways and cellular senescence, linking to miRNA processing and function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-17-92 cluster regulates aging and cancer via AKT/mTOR pathway, linking miRNA expression changes to aging signaling pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Age-associated changes in miRNA 2'-O-methylation and Ago2 loading affect miRNA stability and aging phenotypes, related to miRNA processing.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-80 regulates lifespan via NLP-45 and UPRER, linking miRNA regulation to stress response pathways and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miRNAs (let-7, lin-4) act as intrinsic neuronal timers regulating plasticity and regenerative decline, involving miRNA temporal regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: mir-71 regulates proteostasis and longevity via olfactory neuron signaling, linking miRNA regulation to proteostasis and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MicroRNA Biogenesis and Processing Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mir-23-27-24 cluster regulates multiple aging hallmarks, representing miRNA cluster regulation of aging mechanisms.
